column1: #Text=" Sokka says : " Do n't have to tell me twice .
#Text=" Katara says : " Are you all right , Aang ?
#Text=" Katara says : " You seem to be having a lot of nightmares lately .
#Text=You want to tell me about it ?
#Text=" Aang says : " I think I just need some rest .
#Text=" Sokka says : " You guys want to hear about my dream ?
#Text=I did n't want to talk about it anyway .
